ComicInfo.Title: A Revolution in Oz. Chapter Seven: A Single Loose Rock; Beach Toys. Chapter 7 of Cubs in Toyland.
ComicInfo.AlternateSeries: A Revolution in Oz, Cubs in Toyland
ComicInfo.Summary: Things look grim for Snow White and Bigby Wolf’s lost cubs. Mount-batten is gone. Ranger Mike Danger is in pieces. Dare is injured, with no way to get help. So how can he rescue his sister? Monty’s cryptic last words aren’t any help: “Use the one thing in Madland that isn’t a toy.”
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-05 03:25:04. [CVDB352668] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:31:47. [Issue ID 992077]

ComicInfo.Locations: Toyland,The Farm,Oz,Wolf Valley,New York State,Wolf Manor,North America,Homelands,Emerald City
